required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Test of a New Gel-based Colon Cleansing Agent Compared to Moviprep
clinical_study.official_title: Test of a New Gel-based Colon Cleansing Agent Compared to Moviprep. A Randomized Single-blinded Cross-over Study

brief_summary.textblock: Crossover study comparing Moviprep (for bowel cleansing) with a new gel-based colon cleansing agent before colonoscopy

detailed_description.textblock:
Crossover study comparing Moviprep (for bowel cleansing) with a new gel-based colon cleansing agent before colonoscopy.
Study performed in health subjects.

primary_outcome.description: Visual assessment of the degree of bowel cleansing performed by the endoscopist (blinded). Right colon, colon transversum, and left colon are each judged on a scale from 0-3 with higher scores indicating better cleansing. Range of score between 0-9.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed 4 hours after last intake of cleansing product
primary_outcome.description: Any adverse event related to the intervention observed by investigators or as reported by the participant

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured immediately before the colonoscopy starts, and every 5 minutes during colonoscopy and immediately after the end of the examination
secondary_outcome.description: mmHg systolic and diastolic measured on right or left arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured immediately before the colonoscopy starts, and every 5 minutes during colonoscopy and immediately after the end of the examination
secondary_outcome.description: Oxymeter measuring the saturation of hemoglobin with oxygen as a percentage of 0-100%.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured immediately before the colonoscopy starts, and every 5 minutes during colonoscopy and immediately after the end of the examination
Measured immediately before the colonoscopy starts, and every 5 minutes during colonoscopy and immediately after the end of the examination

arm_group.description: Novel and patented Polyethylene glycol 3350 mixture
Standard of care Polyethylene glycol 3350 mixture

intervention.description: Colonic cleansing before colonoscopy and CT colonografi

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Allergy to content of products

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Surgery, Zealand University Hospital
